name: BDNEWS Headlines
author: ahrana

sections.description:
Display the latest news headlines from bangla.bdnews24.com directly on your WordPress site, keeping your audience updated with real-time news in Bengali

How to Use

after installation then go to Widgets, drag and drop bdnews24 headline widget to your sidebar, and press save.

News Source

You can’t Edit/input/delete source URL, it’s auto attributed source.

License

This file is part of BDNEWS Headlines.

sections.installation:
1. Upload the whole plugin folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Go to the Plugins page and activate the Plugin.
  3. Go to your Go to Widgets
sections.faq:
How does it work?

Just Installed and active your Plugin then go to Widgets options.

I like your work, are you available for hire?

Yes I am, visit my Visit.. page to find out more.
